trans-unit.source: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder egenskaper, metoder og hendelser som er relatert til dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene som vises i den `My.Application` objekt Returner data som er forbundet med den gjeldende applikasjons- eller DLL-filen.

trans-unit.source: No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`.
trans-unit.target: Ingen systemnivå informasjon kan ikke endres med `My.Application`.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase> provides members that are available in all projects.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application` -objektet består av følgende klasser:- <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase>gir medlemmer som er tilgjengelige i alle prosjekter.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> provides members available in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>gir medlemmer som er tilgjengelig i Windows Forms-programmer.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: - ConsoleApplicationBase provides members available in console applications.
trans-unit.target: -ConsoleApplicationBase inneholder medlemmer som er tilgjengelig i konsollen programmer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing the command-line arguments as strings for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder kommandolinjeargumenter som strenger for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property provides read-only access to the current application's command-line arguments for applications that are not ClickOnce deployed.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` egenskapen gir lesetilgang til den gjeldende program kommandolinjeargumenter for programmer som ikke ClickOnce distribuert.

trans-unit.source: For a single-instance application, the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property returns the command-line arguments for the first instance of an application.
trans-unit.target: For en applikasjon for enkel forekomst av `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` egenskapen returnerer kommandolinjeargumenter for den første forekomsten av en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: To access the arguments for subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application, you must handle the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance> event and examine the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs> argument.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til argumentene for senere forsøk på å starte en enkel forekomst-programmet, må du behandle den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>hendelsen, og Undersøk den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs>argumentet.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property returns only the command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` egenskapen returnerer bare kommandolinjeargumenter.

trans-unit.source: This is different from the behavior of the <xref:System.Environment.CommandLine%2A> property, which returns the application name in addition to the arguments.
trans-unit.target: Dette er forskjellig fra virkemåten for den <xref:System.Environment.CommandLine%2A>egenskap, som returnerer programnavnet i tillegg til argumentene.</xref:System.Environment.CommandLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In an application that is ClickOnce deployed, use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.ActivationUri%2A> property of the `My.Application.Deployment` object to get the command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I et program som er ClickOnce distribuert, bruker du den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.ActivationUri%2A>for den `My.Application.Deployment` objekt for å hente kommandolinjeargumenter.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.ActivationUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.Deployment%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.Deployment%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.Deployment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser eksempler på oppgaver som omfatter den `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |To|See| |Check the command-line arguments of subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application|<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>| ## Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|No| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|No| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| | Til | Se | | Kontroller kommandolinjeargumenter av senere forsøk på å starte en enkel forekomst program | <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>| ## Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | Ikke | | Konsollen programmet | **Yes**| | Windows kontrollerer biblioteket | Ikke | | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | **Yes**| | Webområdet | Ikke |</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>, containing the command-line arguments as strings for the current application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>, som inneholder kommandolinjeargumenter som strenger for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current application's ClickOnce deployment object, which provides support for updating the current deployment programmatically and support for the on-demand download of files.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende programmets ClickOnce distribusjonsobjektet, som gir støtte for oppdatering av gjeldende distribusjonen programmatisk og støtte for behovsbetingede nedlasting av filer.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Deployment` property returns the application's ClickOnce <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment> object.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.Deployment` egenskapen returnerer programmets ClickOnce <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment>objektet.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment> object provides support for updating the current deployment programmatically as well as support for the on-demand download of files.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment>objektet gir støtte for oppdatering av gjeldende distribusjonen programmatisk i tillegg til støtte for behovsbetingede nedlasting av filer.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment>

trans-unit.source: For more information on ClickOnce applications and how to deploy them, see [ClickOnce Security and Deployment](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Publishing ClickOnce Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om ClickOnce-programmer og distribuerer dem, kan du se [ClickOnce sikkerhet og distribusjon](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [Publishing ClickOnce-programmer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Confirm that the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.IsNetworkDeployed%2A> property is `True` before you access the `My.Application.Deployment` property.
trans-unit.target: Bekreft at den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.IsNetworkDeployed%2A>egenskapen `True` før du tilgang til den `My.Application.Deployment` egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.IsNetworkDeployed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the application is not deployed using ClickOnce, reading the `My.Application.Deployment` property results in an <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Ellers hvis programmet ikke distribueres med ClickOnce, lesing av `My.Application.Deployment` egenskapen resulterer i en <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>unntak.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>

trans-unit.source: For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om distribusjon av en ClickOnce-programmet, kan du se [slik: publisere en ClickOnce-programmet bruker veiviseren publisere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information on using the `My.Application.Deployment` property, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker den `My.Application.Deployment` egenskapen se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|No| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|No| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | Ikke | | Konsollen programmet | **Yes**| | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | Ikke | | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | **Yes**| | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment"></xref> object for the application's ClickOnce deployment.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment"> </xref> objekt for programmets ClickOnce-distribusjonen.

trans-unit.source: The application is not deployed as a ClickOnce application.
trans-unit.target: Programmet er ikke distribueres som en ClickOnce-programmet.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values to use as the current application's command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdiene som skal brukes som det gjeldende programmet kommandolinjeargumenter.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to set the internal value of the command-line arguments used by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan du angi intern verdien for kommandolinjeargumenter som brukes av <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase>klasse.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: This property determines what the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A> property returns.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer denne egenskapen hva det <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A>returnerer.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, or you set this property to `Nothing`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A> property obtains the command-line arguments from the <xref:System.Environment.CommandLine%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angi denne egenskapen, eller du har sett denne egenskapen til `Nothing`, <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A>egenskapen anskaffer kommandolinjeargumenter fra den <xref:System.Environment.CommandLine%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Environment.CommandLine%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>, containing the strings to use as the command-line arguments for the current application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>, som inneholder strenger som brukes som kommandolinjeargumenter for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> that represents whether the application was deployed from a network using ClickOnce.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> som angir om programmet ble distribuert fra et nettverk med ClickOnce.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed` property indicates whether the application was deployed from a network using ClickOnce.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed` egenskapen angir om programmet ble distribuert fra et nettverk med ClickOnce.

trans-unit.source: For more information on ClickOnce applications, see [ClickOnce Security and Deployment](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om ClickOnce-programmer, kan du se [ClickOnce sikkerhet og distribusjon](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You should confirm that this property is `True` before you access the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.Deployment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du må bekrefte at denne egenskapen er `True` før du tilgang til den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.Deployment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.Deployment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the application is not deployed from a network using ClickOnce, reading the `My.Application.Deployment` property results in an <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Ellers hvis programmet ikke er distribuert fra et nettverk med ClickOnce, lesing av `My.Application.Deployment` egenskapen resulterer i en <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>unntak.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>

trans-unit.source: For more information on configuring ClickOnce, see [Publishing ClickOnce Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer ClickOnce [Publishing ClickOnce-programmer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om distribusjon av en ClickOnce-programmet, kan du se [slik: publisere en ClickOnce-programmet bruker veiviseren publisere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information on using the `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed` property, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker den `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed` egenskapen se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|No| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|No| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | Ikke | | Konsollen programmet | **Yes**| | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | Ikke | | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | **Yes**| | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> that represents whether the application was deployed from a network.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> som angir om programmet ble distribuert fra et nettverk.

trans-unit.source: The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the current application was deployed from a network; otherwise the value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""> </xref> om dette programmet ble distribuert fra et nettverk; hvis verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>.
